梅.definition: plum; plum flower; Japanese apricot (Prunus mume)

梅乾菜.definition: salt-pickled sun-dried cabbage (or potherb mustard etc)

梅山.definition: Meishan Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

梅山鄉.definition: Meishan Township in Chiayi County 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 Xian4], west Taiwan

梅州市.definition: Meizhou, prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province 廣東省|广东省[Guang3dong1 Sheng3]

梅德韋傑夫.definition: Medvedyev (name); Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008

梅斯梅爾.definition: Mesmer (name); Franz Anton Mesmer (1734-1815), Austrian doctor who introduced hypnosis

梅核氣.definition: (TCM) plum-pit qi, a feeling of a lump in the throat (globus pharyngis) or of stagnant phlegm

梅氏.definition: Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies

梅江.definition: Meijiang district of Meizhou city 梅州市, Guangdong

梅江區.definition: Meijiang district of Meizhou city 梅州市, Guangdong

梅河口.definition: Meihekou, county-level city in Tonghua 通化, Jilin

梅河口市.definition: Meihekou, county-level city in Tonghua 通化, Jilin

梅派.definition: the Mei Lanfang School; see 梅蘭芳|梅兰芳[Mei2 Lan2 fang1]

梅瑟.definition: Moses (Catholic translation); also 摩西 (Protestant translation)

梅花.definition: plum blossom; clubs ♣ (a suit in card games); (dialect) wintersweet

梅花拳.definition: Meihua Quan - "Plum Blossom Fist" (Chinese Martial Art)

梅蘭芳.definition: Mei Lanfang (1894-1961), famous master of Beijing opera, specialist in female roles

梅西耶.definition: Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies

梅西耶星表.definition: Messier catalog of nebulae and clusters (1784)

梅西葉.definition: Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies

梅西葉星表.definition: Messier catalog of nebulae and clusters (1784)

梅里亞姆·韋伯斯特.pinyin: Mei2 li3 ya4 mu3 · Wei2 bo2 si1 te4

梅里斯.definition: Meilisi Daur district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

梅里斯區.definition: Meilisi Daur district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

梅里斯達斡爾族區.pinyin: Mei2 li3 si1 Da2 wo4 er3 zu2 qu1

梅里美.definition: Prosper Mérimée (1803-1870), French scholar and writer, author of novel Carmen on which Bizet based his opera

梅里雪山.definition: Meili Snow Mountains, with peaks up to 6000 m., in Diqing Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

梅雨.definition: East Asian rainy season (in late spring and early summer)
